title: For Sale:  K98 German Mauser
location: near Trenton & Tiny Town Rd., Clarksville, Tennessee
postcontent: Selling this German K98 Mauser rifle. Chambered in 7.92X57 (8mm Mauser). Includes Yugo Mauser sling and bayonet. bayonet This rifle is known as a Yugo Capture. It came under the control of the Yugoslavians late in World War II. The Yugoslavians scrubbed most German markings, except for "Mod.98" on the left side of the receiver. They then stamped the receiver, bolt handle and stock with their own serial number. All these numbers match. The serial numbers of the trigger guard, magazine floor plate and bayonet do not match .  The bayonet and scabbard seriels numbers match each other.  The rifle is in very good condition, with an excellent bore. The finish is worn in some areas, especially the receiver ring and the trigger guard. There is a chip and fine crack to the stock at the wrist that is approximately 4 inches long. $400 FIRM,  Not interested in any trade offers.  Local pick up only in Clarksville near Exit 1 (intersection of Trenton & Tiny Town roads).

title: For Sale:  Springfield model 1884
postcontent: This item is an antique Springfield model 1884. The design for this rifle was originally based on the design of the Springfield model 1873, which is also a single shot rifle with a hinged breechblock that opens like a trapdoor. Often called the Trapdoor Rifle, this gun features adjustable sights for both elevation AND windage. This rifle is chambered in .45-70 caliber, but as the stock has a crack in it, it would likely be wisest to have it inspected by a gunsmith before firing it. This rifle is missing the original cleaning rod, but is in otherwise very good shape. Thanks for looking at our item! Georgia residents pay 7% sales tax, and shipping is only $35.  If you have any questions please feel free to give us a call at REDACTED. Check us out on FaceBook at Appalachian Gun & Pawn. The Thunder 380 is very accurate and reliable.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Rare 1964 Fender AA864 Circuit Bassman Amp
location: Near New Haven/ Hoagland Area, Fort Wayne, Indiana
postcontent: Looking to trade or possibly sell my 1964 blackface Fender Bassman Guitar / Bass amp w/ the coveted rare AA864 circuit. These were one of the last amps that Leo Fender had a hand in designing before the CBS buyout. The head was verified by Sweetwater as an un-molested original AA864. I had Sweetwater also go thru the head and replace leaking caps with Sprague, re-tube, install grounded 3-prong plug, remove death cap, and replace a couple arching tube sockets. Only replaced what was needed to maintain originality of the amp. I have all the original components that were removed and paperwork from the service. The cab has original tilt back legs, head mounting hardware, etc. it is currently loaded with two newer 12" Eminence Legend speakers. Everything works as it should and sounds great! $1750 obo cash or trade.

title: For Sale/Trade:  Benelli SuperNova Tac 12ga 3.5mags Ghost ring sights NIB!!
postcontent:
Brand new(does not mean fired just a little). I had this on lay-away for a while and inherited another in the interim. I paid $549 for it, just looking for a quick sale. Please have NH ID and carry permit.

Benelli's SuperNova Tactical embodies a modular design concept in a 12-gauge pump-action shotgun. At the heart of this pump gun is a lightweight steel skeleton framework over-molded with a high-tech polymer, making the SuperNova Tactical super-light, super-strong, and almost completely impervious to any weather condition. But the SuperNova Tactical isn't just tough on the outside. Dual-action bars and a two-lug rotary bolt head that locks up steel to steel inside the barrel ensures that the SuperNova Tactical is rock solid to the core and capable of handling everything from 2-3/4" light loads to 3-1/2" Magnums.

This SuperNova Tactical comes with newly designed, military-style ghost-ring sights (the harder to find version, sold out just about everywhere). The rear sight is click-adjustable for both windage and elevation. A magazine cut-off on the forearm allows for safe carry with a full magazine and empty chamber. The top of the SuperNova's receiver is drilled and tapped to accommodate easy attachment of military-style optics.


Benelli’s SuperNova Tactical is a modular concept pump action shotgun, that can be configured to fit any defense or tactical situation. The ComforTech stock absorbs nearly 48% of felt recoil to dampen the recoil of heavy buck shot loads. In addition to taming recoil, the ComforTech system minimizes barrel climb, putting you back on target twice as fast as other comparable shotguns. For tight quarters when clearing buildings or in a patrol vehicle nothing beats the compact versatility of the SuperNova.

This Benelli Supernova Tactical (20155) is a pump action shotgun that fires the 12 gauge shell. It has an 18.5” cylinder chrome lined barrel, overall 40" length, 2-3/4", 3", & 3.5" chamber, with a matte black finish. 7.8 lbs unloaded. This is a brand new shotgun that holds 5 shells (4+1 capacity) and comes complete with a Comfortech stock, receiver, barrel, ghost ring sights, stock shims, etc., manual, warranty card, and a box. Complete! All Mint, NIB. Many options available.

The Benelli SuperNova embodies a modular design concept in a pump action shotgun. It’s like having several Benelli shotguns in one.
At the heart of this new pump gun is a lightweight steel skeleton framework over-molded with a high-tech polymer, making the new SuperNova super-light, super-strong and almost completely impervious to any weather condition. But the SuperNova isn’t just tough on the outside. With its dual-action bars and two-lug rotary bolt head that locks up steel to steel inside the barrel, the SuperNova is rock solid to the core

title: For Sale:  ***SOLD*** Spike's Spikes Tactical Fake Can Suppressor Silencer AR15 AR 15
location: garner/clayton/40/42, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
Essentially new. I put it on a AR15 for the cool factor. Never fired. Switched to a Miculek Compensator.

Info from Spike's:

The Spike’s Tactical CAR-1 Fake Can gives you the looks of having a 10.5” suppressed rifle but doesn’t come with all of the expense and paperwork that’s required for the real thing. This is how it works; The CAR-1 shrouds back over the barrel of your rifle concealing part of it inside of the CAR-1. This is what gives the illusion of a suppressed SBR and of course, no stamp is required. Keep in mind, this fake can is just for cosmetic looks and does not provide any sound suppression whatsoever. The CAR-1 should only be used with barrels with Carbine length gas systems. 

We CNC machine these fake cans out of solid 6061 Aluminum bar stock for strength and top them off with a durable Anodized finish. The length of the can is 5.5” and has a diameter of 1.25” that will fit under some rail systems (please contact the manufacturer of your rail system to see if our CAR-1 fake can will fit under your rail if you intend to do this). 

NOTE: The CAR-1 can is threaded for 1/2x28 barrels. If you are unsure of what your barrel is threaded for, please contact the manufacturer.

Features

Precision CNC machined from 6061 Aluminum Bar Stock
Anodized finish
Weight of 6.5oz and 5.5 inches in length
Spike’s Tactical CAR-1 Fake Can

title: For Sale:  CUSTOM COMBAT/SURVIVAL FIRST AID KIT FROM KILOTON
location: Navarre, East of Pensacola and Gulf Breeze, Pensacola, Florida
postcontent: Hello, I am the owner of Kiloton Tactical LLC, a local gun and equipment shop. Over the past year I've been putting together survival kits and first aid kits and trying to get the perfect all around portable first aid kit. I worked with doctors and special operations medical technicians in order to create the best product. I was able to create an excellent product full of high quality items at a low price by obtaining all items individually from wholesale distributors. Similar kits sell online for anywhere from $200 to $400. This kit has everything you need to deal with daily minor injuries, bug bites, burns, scratches, and such. It also has the goods to deal with traumatic combat related injuries, not to mention everything inbetween. The kit can be customized to order on request with added or removed items. The complete kit fits inside a Blackhawk MOLLE capable medical pouch which is included.
